member.name: MOUSEHOOKSTRUCT
member.summary: Contains information about a mouse event passed to a WH_MOUSE hook procedure, MouseProc.

member.name: MOUSEHOOKSTRUCT.pt
member.summary: The x- and y-coordinates of the cursor, in screen coordinates.

member.name: MOUSEHOOKSTRUCT.hwnd
member.summary: A handle to the window that will receive the mouse message corresponding to the mouse event.

member.name: MOUSEHOOKSTRUCT.wHitTestCode
member.summary: The hit-test value. For a list of hit-test values, see the description of the WM_NCHITTEST message.

member.name: MOUSEHOOKSTRUCT.dwExtraInfo
member.summary: Additional information associated with the message.
